track.name: Drown in My Own Tears
comments: Good song. Everyone have a good New Yeat.
One of the Masters.... His autobiographical movie with Jamie Fox is good too, if for nothing else than GREAT versions of so many of his hits. (But, really, the film is worth seeing too.)
Genius is sometimes bandied about for too many run of the mill artists.  However, it definitely applies to Ray Charles.
I still think it's a nice song.
Love it!!!
Such a  nice song.
Ray Charles - Legend!!!
So much soul.
Rysiu z Klanu to ty?
Love this!
What can U say U can only listen !!!!
Ray Charles...Atlantic Records 1956. #1 R&B Hit
wie alles was er tat gut gut gut
Beautiful!
First listen to this and I have to agree this is everything Ray Charles was about............brilliant
Von Ray Charles hab ich noch nie ein schlechtes Lied gehört.
Everything that was great about Ray Charles is in this song.
I really love this song!!!
for better or vworst, it sure captures my mood @ this very moment
I am in love with this song. It's probably one of my more favorite Ray tracks.
